tvs.caption: Content purpose
tvs.name: content_purpose
tvs.description: Describe the primary function of this content. Even though you can select multiple options, try to narrow it down to just 1 if possible. This will make the content more focused and the editing process a little easier.
tvs.inputOptionValues: @SELECT `name` AS `name`,`id` FROM `setinputoptions_inputoptions` WHERE `group` = 3 AND `softDelete` = 0 ORDER BY position

tvs.caption: Content result
tvs.name: content_result
tvs.description: Describe the desired effect of this page. What did the visitor gain from reading this? And what good will that do for you?

tvs.caption: Content follow-up
tvs.name: content_followup
tvs.description: Based on the answer to the previous question: describe the action you want the visitor to take after viewing this content. Buy your product, request a demo, subscribe to your newsletter, share the content, change their opinion, donate to your cause...

tvs.caption: Why is this page needed?
tvs.name: content_why
tvs.description: Drill down to the core of the subject to answer the ultimate question: is this page absolutely necessary? If not: shelve this page for later and move on to the next.

tvs.caption: Priority
tvs.name: content_priority
tvs.description: Based on the answer to the previous question: indicate how important and urgent the publication of this page is.
tvs.inputOptionValues: @SELECT `name` AS `name`,`id` FROM `setinputoptions_inputoptions` WHERE `group` = 4 AND `softDelete` = 0 ORDER BY position

tvs.caption: Repurposing
tvs.name: content_repurpose
tvs.description: Can you think of ways to reuse this content in different places or scenarios? Or if this content is being repurposed from somewhere else: can you point to that source? NB: connections are not saved until you save the page itself!
